RPGXplorerObject.Name: Anarchic
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon is aligned to Chaos.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Axiomatic
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon is aligned to Law.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bane
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2, +2d6 vs. target creature type.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Brilliant Energy
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon has its significant portion transformed into light. Weapon ignores non-living matter.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dancing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon can be loosed to attack on its own for 4 rounds at BAB of the wielder then drops.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Defending
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wielder can transfer some or all of the weapon's bonus to AC.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Disruption
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Any undead creature struck in combat must succeed on a DC 14 Will save or be destroyed.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Distance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Range increment is doubled.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Flaming
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Upon command weapon or ammo is sheathed in fire and deals an extra 1d6 fire damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Flaming Burst
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Flaming weapon that also explodes with flame upon a critical hit.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: 1d10 Extra Fire Damage on Critical, x3 2d10, x4 3d10
Frost
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Upon command weapon or ammo is sheathed in icy cold and deals 1d6 extra cold damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ghost Touch
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon deals damage normally against incorporeal creatures.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Holy
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Good aligned. Deals 2d6 damage against evil. Bestows one negative level on evil wielder.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Icy Burst
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Frost weapon that also explodes with frost upon a critical hit.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: 1d10 Extra Cold Damage on Critical, x3 2d10, x4 3d10
Keen
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Doubles the threat range of a piercing or slashing weapon.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ki Focus
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon serves as a channel for ki allowing wielder to use ki attacks through weapon as if unarmed.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Merciful
RPGXplorerObject.Description: All damage dealt by weapon is non-lethal. Weapon deals an extra 1d6 damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mighty Cleaving
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wielder can make one additional Cleave per round (if they have the feat).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Returning
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A returning weapon flies through the air back to the creature that threw it.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Seeking
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon veers toward its target negating any miss chances e.g. from concealment.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shock
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Upon command weapon or ammo is sheathed in crackling electricity.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shocking Burst
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Shock weapon that also explodes with electricity upon a critical hit.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: 1d10 Extra Electricity Damage on Critical, x3 2d10, x4 3d10
Speed
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When making a full attack, wielder gets an extra attack with weapon at BAB.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Spell Storing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon can store a single spell of up 3rd level that can be unleashed on target.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Thundering
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon creates a cacophonous roar like thunder upon a critical hit.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: 1d8 Extra Sonic Damage on Critical, x3 2d8, x4 3d8
Throwing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Melee weapon gains range increment of 10ft.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Unholy
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Evil Aligned. Deals 2d6 damage against good. Bestows one negative level on good wielder.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Vicious
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Deals 2d6 extra damage to target. Disruptive flash also deals 1d6 to wielder.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Vorpal
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Opponent's head is severed on natural 20 followed by successful attack roll.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Wounding
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Deals 1 point of CON damage from blood loss. Crit does not multiply this damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Versus Creatures Not Immune to Critical Hits
RPGXplorerObject.Condition: Versus Creatures Not Immune to Critical Hits

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bodyfeeder
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Upon critical hit grants temporary hit points equal to damage dealt.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Collision
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Deal an extra 5 points of damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Coup de Grace
RPGXplorerObject.Description: On successful critical hits target must make DC27 Will save or be paralyzed for 1 round.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dislocator
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Target must make DC17 Will save or be teleported 1-100 miles in a random direction (3/day).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dissipater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Ignores DR and hardness, and all hits critical vs. creatures/objects composed of ectoplasm.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Great Dislocator
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Target must make DC20 Will save or be teleported to a random plane (3/day).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Lucky
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day wielder can reroll a failed attack roll.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Manifester
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Generates 5 power points per day for the wielder.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mindcrusher
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Creature struck loses power points equal to half damage dealt.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mindfeeder
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants temporary power points equal to damage dealt upon successful critical hit.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Parrying
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants a +1 insight bonus to AC and saving throws vs. powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Power Storing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Holds a single power up to 5 points which is unleashed on target when hit.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psibane
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Additional +2 enhancement and extra 2d6 damage vs. psionic creatures.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psychic
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Enhancement bonus of weapon varies according to wielder's power points.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psychokinetic
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Deals an extra 1d4 points of damage. Damage not affected by damage reduction.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psychokinetic Burst
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Psychokinetic weapon plus deals extra damage on critical hit.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: 2d6 Extra Damage on Critical, x3 3d6, x4 4d6
Soulbreaker
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Bestows negative level on creature struck.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sundering
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants Improved Sunder feat when using the weapon.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Suppression
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Creature or object struck is subject to a targeted Dispel Psionics power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Teleporting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Weapon returns to thrower via Astral Plane, ready for use next turn.
